SEARCH
Package com.axelor.utils.rest

Class UtilsRestServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.axelor.utils.rest.UtilsRestServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UtilsRestService
public class UtilsRestServiceImpl extends Object implements UtilsRestService
Implementation of UtilsRestService. Provides optimized methods for working with MetaModels and their references.

Performance optimizations include:

  • Caching: Uses ConcurrentHashMap to cache model lookups, reducing database queries
  • Batch Processing: Fetches multiple models in a single query instead of individual lookups
  • Stream Improvements: Optimized filter conditions and null checks for better efficiency
  • Error Handling: Proper logging and comprehensive null checks for robustness

These optimizations significantly reduce database queries, lower memory usage, improve response times, and enhance scalability for model reference processing.

  • Method Details

    • addReferences

      public void addReferences(com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel model, List<com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel> listOfRef, String... types)
      Adds references of the specified types to the provided list. This implementation only processes the first level of references without recursion.

      Performance optimizations:

      • Implements batch fetching of models instead of individual queries
      • Adds early returns for null inputs and empty results to avoid unnecessary processing
      • Safely handles empty sets to prevent NoSuchElementException
      Specified by:
      addReferences in interface UtilsRestService
      Parameters:
      model - the MetaModel to find references for
      listOfRef - the list to add references to
      types - the relationship types to include (e.g., "ONE_TO_ONE", "ONE_TO_MANY")

    • isReference

      protected static boolean isReference(com.axelor.db.mapper.Property property, String[] types)

    • getModel

      public com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel getModel(String fullName)
      Gets a MetaModel by its full class name with caching. This optimized implementation caches results to avoid repeated database queries.

      Performance optimizations:

      • Uses ConcurrentHashMap to cache model lookups by full class name
      • Checks cache before making database queries
      • Caches null results to avoid repeated lookups for non-existent models
      • Adds null check to prevent NullPointerExceptions
      Specified by:
      getModel in interface UtilsRestService
      Parameters:
      fullName - the full class name (e.g., "com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel")
      Returns:
      the corresponding MetaModel, or null if not found

    • getModels

      protected Map<String,com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel> getModels(Set<String> fullNames)
      Batch fetches multiple models by their full names. This reduces database queries compared to fetching each model individually.

      Performance benefits:

      • Reduces N+1 query problem by fetching all models in a single database query
      • Populates the model cache for future lookups
      • Minimizes database round-trips, especially important for large model hierarchies
      • Improves response time for operations that need to fetch multiple related models
      Parameters:
      fullNames - set of full class names
      Returns:
      map of full names to their corresponding MetaModel objects
